interestingFact: China is the most populous country in the world and has the Great Wall of China.
India is the largest democracy in the world and home to the iconic Taj Mahal.
The U.S. is the third most populous country and the only country to have landed humans on the moon.
Indonesia is the world's largest island country, with over 17,000 islands.
Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, the largest rainforest in the world.
Russia is the largest country in the world by area, spanning 11 time zones.
Japan has the world's oldest monarchy and is known for its technological innovations.
Germany is Europe's largest economy and the birthplace of the famous Oktoberfest.
Nigeria is Africa's most populous country and is rich in oil reserves.
